title: "Couldn't back up data - Please try again later" is shown
content: When accessing Settings->System->Backup and tapping Back up now, backing up to Google Drive tries to start, but gives me an error message: "Couldn't back up data - Please try again later". However, this happens after my phone does a partial back up to Google Drive before I restart it. Also, the "Couldn't back up data - Please try again later" error message deletes my phone's backup from Google Drive.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
